title: Dashboard Overview Load
description: Verify the dashboard loads correctly displaying statistics, charts, and calendar widgets with accurate data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard page after successful login.
Check statistics section is populated with current system data.
Verify charts render correctly with valid and updated data points.
Ensure calendar widgets display correct dates and highlight relevant events.

title: Booking Calendar Multi-Vehicle Scheduling
description: Verify users can schedule and view bookings for multiple vehicles per customer in the Booking Calendar with dark theme enabled.

steps.description: Navigate to Booking Calendar page.
Create a new booking linked to a customer with multiple VINs.
Verify all vehicles are displayed properly and selectable in the booking entry.
Switch UI to dark theme in settings.
Confirm Booking Calendar displays correctly in dark mode.
Check that the booking persists and shows accurate scheduling details on reload.

title: Order Management Bulk Operations and Note Editing
description: Validate that order management supports bulk edits, adding/editing notes, reminders, and attachments with modal dialogs.

steps.description: Go to Orders Management page.
Select multiple orders in the data grid.
Perform bulk status update and confirm changes reflect properly.
Open the modal dialog for one order to add and edit notes.
Verify notes save successfully and appear in the order details.
Add reminders and attachments through modal dialogs.
Check reminders and attachments are linked correctly and displayed.

title: Inventory Tracking and Sheet Locking
description: Verify real-time inventory updates with status changes and sheet locking feature in the Main Sheet interface.

steps.description: Navigate to Main Sheet page.
Update inventory status for a vehicle or part.
Confirm status changes reflect instantly and persist after page reload.
Enable sheet locking.
Attempt to modify locked inventory items.
Verify modifications are prevented while sheet is locked.
Disable sheet locking.
Confirm modifications are now allowed.

title: Call List Customer Communication Flow
description: Check call list management including adding customers, updating call statuses, and managing call queues.

steps.description: Open Call List page.
Add a customer entry to the call list.
Verify customer appears in the queue with correct details.
Update the call status of the customer (e.g., called, no answer).
Confirm that status update is saved and visible.
Remove customer from the call list.
Ensure customer is no longer listed.

title: Archive and Item Restoration
description: Confirm archive system archives completed items and allows orderly restoration to active workflow without data loss.

steps.description: Navigate to Archive page.
Archive a completed order or vehicle.
Verify the item is removed from active lists and appears in Archive.
Use reorder functionality to restore archived item back to active orders.
Confirm restored item reappears in active workflow with intact data.

title: Global Search Functional Accuracy and Performance
description: Test the global search features spanning VINs, customers, parts, and companies returning accurate and timely results.

steps.description: Use the global search to query by customer name.
Verify relevant customer records are returned.
Search by VIN and check matching vehicle records.
Ensure VIN related data appears accurately.
Perform searches using part names and company names.
Confirm returned results include relevant entries for parts and companies.
Measure response time and ensure results are delivered within acceptable limits.

title: Settings Modal Customization and Persistence
description: Verify the settings modal allows UI theme changes, status management, and history tracking updates with persistence across sessions.

steps.description: Open the Settings Modal via the UI.
Change booking status values.
Validate the new booking statuses are saved and applied.
Switch UI theme between light and dark.
Confirm theme changes reflect immediately across the app.
Modify history settings within the modal.
Ensure history changes are stored and can be retrieved in future sessions.

title: Notification System Alert and Navigation
description: Check robust notifications display with alert badges and clicking notification navigates and auto-scrolls to related data entries.

steps.description: Trigger a system event that generates a notification (e.g. parts arrival).
Verify the notification appears with correct alert badge count.
Click the notification.
Confirm navigation to the relevant page and auto-scroll to the associated record or alert.

title: Automatic Workflow Transition on Parts Arrival
description: Validate the automated workflow triggers moving VINs to Call List once parts arrival conditions are met.

steps.description: Update parts inventory status to 'Arrival Complete' for an order with a VIN.
Check that the associated VIN is automatically moved from inventory/main sheet to the Call List.
Ensure no manual intervention is required for this transition.

title: Data Integrity and Syncing with Supabase and Query Management
description: Verify data consistency and synchronization across all modules using Supabase backend integrated with React Query cache management.

steps.description: Perform concurrent updates on orders and inventory in different browser sessions.
Verify data syncs correctly with no stale or conflicting data shown.
Simulate network interruption during data save.
Check that error is handled gracefully and data retries or restores as expected.

title: UI Component Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Ensure all reusable UI components comply with responsive layouts and accessibility standards across supported devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Load main UI pages on various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Verify UI components resize and rearrange properly without content overflow or truncation.
Navigate the UI using keyboard only.
Confirm all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Use screen reader to interact with UI.
Check proper labeling and announcements for UI components.
